name: 19th Century

name: 202 Steps

Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice
Double strain into double rocks glass with 1 large ice cube

name: 20th Century

name: 6th Street Swizzle
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz La Favorite Rhum Agricole Blanc Coeur de Canne
instructions: Whip all ingredients with a few pieces of crushed ice
Pour into pilsner glass filled with crushed ice
Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel

name: Airmail
ingredients: sparkling white wine to top off
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except sparkling wine) with ice

name: Aka Cobbler
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz jalapeño-infused Siembra Azul Blanco Tequila
1⁄2 oz Lustau East India Solera Sherry
instructions: Muddle simple syrup, maraschino liqueur, lemon twists, strawberry and sugar cube in a shaker
Add both tequilas and sherry and whip (shake with a few pieces of crushed ice until just incorporated)
Garnish with half a strawberry; serve with a straw

name: Alembic
ingredients: 2 oz Hotaling & Co Genevieve Genever Style Gin
3 dash Death & Co House Peychaud's Bitters
instructions: Strain into rocks glass with one large ice cube

name: Alex's Margarita
instructions: Rim glass with kosher salt (put salt on plate or in bowl, wet at least half of the rim with a lime wedge, place rim into salt)
Shake all ingredients over ice (ideally with two large cubes, vigorously, for 15-20 seconds)
Double strain over double rocks glass with one large ice cube

name: Almond Brother
ingredients: 1 tsp Rothman & Winter Orchard Apricot Liqueur

name: Alta California
instructions: Stir all ingredients (note, recipe calls for a "scant" 1/2 oz of Yellow Chartreuse) over ice

name: Amityville

name: Anjou Mama

Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice

name: Aperitivo Julep
ingredients: 1 tsp G.E. Massenez Crème de Pêche
instructions: Add all ingredients into julep tin
Fill the tin halfway with crushed ice
Stir with a spoon, churning the ice as you go, for 10 seconds, holding the tin by the bottom
Add more crushed ice so the tin is two-thirds full and stir until tin is completely frosted
Add more crushed ice to form a cone above the rim
Garnish with mint bouquet in the center of the ice

name: Aperol Spritz
instructions: Add all ingredients into white wine glass filled most of the way with ice
Drop an orange crescent into the drink

name: Arrack Strap

1 tsp G.E. Massenez Crème de Pêche

name: Stinger
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz Marie Brizard Menthe Blanche White Crème de Menthe
instructions: Short shake all ingredients with 3 ice cubes
Strain into double rocks glass filled with crushed ice

name: St. James Infirmary
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz Saint James Royal Ambré Rhum Agricole
1 dash The Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas' Bitters

name: St. Matilda
instructions: Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice

name: Stolen Huffy
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz red Thai chile-infused Rittenhouse Rye
3⁄4 oz Death & Co House Sweet Vermouth

name: Strange Brew
ingredients: Green Flash West Coast IPA to top off
instructions: Short shake ingredients (except IPA) with 3 ice cubes
Strain into pilsner glass filled with crushed ice
Garnish with mint sprig; serve with a straw

name: Straw Dog
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz Compass Box Asyla Blended Scotch Whisky
instructions: Gently muddle strawberry in a shaker
Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice

name: Stringer Bell
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz jalapeño-infused Siembra Azul Blanco Tequila
instructions: Strain into double rocks glass with one large ice cube

name: Summer Shack
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz Martin Miller's Westbourne Strength Gin
instructions: Squeeze orange twist over drink and discard

name: Sunset at Gowanus
ingredients: 1⁄4 oz Laird's 100 Proof Straight Apple Brandy (Bottled in Bond)

name: Sunset Gun
instructions: Gently muddle Kaffir lime leaves in shaker
Add remaining ingredients; shake with ice

name: Sure Shot
ingredients: 3⁄4 oz Ancho chile-infused Dolin Rouge Vermouth
1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters

name: Susie Q
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except sparkling rosé) with ice

name: Swearengen Sling
instructions: Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice
Strain into highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with cherry on a cocktail pick; serve with a straw

name: Sweep the Leg
instructions: Short shake all ingredients with 3 ice cubes
Strain into pilsner glass filled with crushed ice
Put lime wheel, orange crescent and cherry on a cocktail pick and insert into ice with a mint sprig

name: Sweet and Vicious
instructions: Gently muddle apple slices in mixing glass
Add remaining ingredients and stir over ice

name: Sweet Hereafter
ingredients: 2 oz Campo de Encanto Acholado Pisco
instructions: Squeeze grapefruit twist over mixing glass and discard
Add remaining ingredients and stir over ice

name: Tailspin
ingredients: 1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters
instructions: Rinse coupe with Campari and dump

name: Tea in the Sahara
ingredients: 2 oz coconut green tea-infused The Famous Grouse Scotch
instructions: Squeeze lemon coin over drink and drop in
Add remaining ingredients and stir over ice

name: Te Amo
ingredients: 2 tsp Marie Brizard Cacao Blanc White Crème de Cacao
1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters

name: Tea Time at Guillermo's
ingredients: 1 oz The Scarlet Ibis Trinidad Rum
1⁄2 oz Queen of Earl tea-infused Siembra Azul Reposado Tequila
1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters
1 dash Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-Aged Bitters
instructions: Strain into Old Fashioned glass with one large ice cube

name: Tenement Yard
ingredients: 2 oz sugar snap pea-infused Plymouth Gin
1⁄2 oz Dolin Génépy le Chamois (des Alpes) Liqueur

name: Tequila Gumption
instructions: Strain into double rocks glass over one large ice cube

name: Terrible Love
ingredients: 1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters
instructions: Strain into Old Fashioned glass with 1 large ice cube

name: The Bittenbender
instructions: Muddle raspberries, lemon twist, and orange twist in a shaker
Add remaining ingredients (except sparkling wine) and shake with ice
Strain into snifter with one large ice cube

name: The Black Prince
ingredients: 1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters

name: The Commandant
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz Perry's Tot Navy Strength Gin
1⁄2 oz Coco López Cream of Coconut
instructions: Short shake all ingredients with 3 ice cubes
Strain into coconut mug filled with crushed ice
Garnish with lime wheel; serve with a straw

name: The Dangerous Summer
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz G.E. Massenez Kirsch Vieux Cherry Brandy
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice (except orange twist)
Flame orange twist over drink and discard

name: The Gift Shop
ingredients: 2 oz Banks 5 Island Blend White Rum
instructions: Muddle 3 cucumber wheels in a shaker
Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice
Double strain into double rocks glass
Garnish with 3 cucumber wheels fanned on top of drink

name: The Great Pretender
ingredients: 2 oz Smith & Cross Traditional Jamaica Rum

name: The Monroe
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz Hotaling & Co Junípero Gin (Anchor Junípero Gin)
1⁄2 tsp G.E. Massenez Crème de Pêche
3 dash Death & Co House Peychaud's Bitters
1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except club soda) over ice
Strain into double rocks glass with 1 large ice cube

name: The Risk Pool
ingredients: 1⁄4 oz Rothman & Winter Crème de Violette

name: The Vanderbilt
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz Laird's 100 Proof Straight Apple Brandy (Bottled in Bond)
instructions: Strain into double rocks glass with one large ice cube

name: Tiki-Tiki Tom-Tom
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz The Scarlet Ibis Trinidad Rum
instructions: Strain into double rocks glass with one large ice cube

name: Ti Punch
ingredients: 2 oz La Favorite Rhum Agricole Blanc Coeur de Canne
instructions: Muddle lime and cane sugar syrup in double rocks glass until lime is well juiced
Add rum and cracked ice and stir

name: Tom Collins
instructions: Short shake all ingredients, except club soda, with 3 ice cubes
Strain into highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with orange and cherry flag

name: Tommy and the Ron-Dels
instructions: Strain into Old Fashioned glass with 1 large ice cube

name: Trapeze
ingredients: 1 dash Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-Aged Bitters
sparkling white wine to top off
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except sparkling wine) over ice

name: Trembling Bell
ingredients: 1 tsp G.E. Massenez Crème de Pêche
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except lemon twist) over ice
Squeeze lemon twist over drink and discard

name: Ty Cobbler
instructions: Muddle cherries and sugar cube in a shaker
Add remaining ingredients and dry shake
Pour into double rocks glass filled with crushed ice

name: Uno, Dos, Tres
instructions: Flame orange twist over drink, then drop it in

name: Vampire Blues
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz Lustau East India Solera Sherry
instructions: Strain into double rocks glass filled with ice
Garnish with a few grates of cinnamon, then drop the stick in the drink; serve with a straw

name: Vejk Sling
ingredients: 2 oz Compass Box Asyla Blended Scotch Whisky
1 oz chamomile-infused Martini & Rossi Bianco Vermouth
1 dash Death & Co House Orange Bitters
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except club soda) with ice
Strain into highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with lemon twist; serve with a straw

name: Velvet Warhol
ingredients: 2 oz banana chip-infused Goslings Black Seal Rum
1⁄4 oz Marie Brizard Cacao Blanc White Crème de Cacao
2 dash The Bitter Truth Aromatic Bitters
instructions: Stir all ingredients (except cream) over ice

name: Vieux Carré
ingredients: 1 dash Death & Co House Peychaud's Bitters

name: Village to Village
instructions: Short shake all ingredients with 3 ice cubes
Strain into pilsner glass filled with crushed ice
Garnish with 2 dashes bitters and mint sprig; serve with a straw

name: Vipera
ingredients: 2 oz spiced pear-infused Siembra Azul Blanco Tequila
1⁄2 oz Laird's 100 Proof Straight Apple Brandy (Bottled in Bond)

name: Warehouse C
ingredients: 1 dash The Bitter Truth Aromatic Bitters
instructions: Gently muddle strawberry in a shaker
Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice

name: Waterloo Sunset
instructions: Gently muddle mint leaves and cane sugar syrup in shaker
Add remaining ingredients; shake with ice
Double strain into double rocks glass with 1 large ice cube

name: Whirling Tiger
instructions: Strain into highball glass filled with ice
Garnish with apple slice; serve with a straw

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Dry shake all ingredients, except Angostura, then shake again with ice
Double strain into double rocks glass with one large ice cube
Add dash of Angostura bitters on top
Garnish with orange and cherry flag

name: White Negroni
instructions: Strain into double rocks glass with one large ice cube

name: White Russian
instructions: Add vodka and coffee liqueur to Old Fashioned glass filled with ice
Slowly top with heavy cream (pour it over the back of the spoon to help layer)

name: Wicked Kiss
ingredients: 1 oz Laird's 100 Proof Straight Apple Brandy (Bottled in Bond)

name: Widow's Laurel
instructions: Garnish with brandied cherries on a cocktail pick

name: Wooden Ship
ingredients: 1 dash Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-Aged Bitters

name: Yama Blanca
ingredients: 1⁄2 oz jalapeño-infused Siembra Azul Blanco Tequila

name: Zihuatanejo Julep
instructions: Rub the mint around the inside of the julep tin and discard
Fill the tin with crushed ice
Add the tequila and demerara syrup
Swizzle briefly, then top with crushed ice
Grate the side of a cinnamon stick away from the drink to release its aromas, then place the stick and mint bouquet in the center of the ice

name: Zombie Punch
ingredients: 11⁄2 oz Appleton Estate Signature Blend Rum
instructions: Shake all ingredients with 2 ice cubes
Strain into tiki mug filled with crushed ice
